question:
What's the summary of Game 4?
(A) In the fourth quarter, Paul hits a layup at the beginning, Anderson scores inside, and Barlow scores a three-pointer. Australia does not give up, 87-75. Deron hits another three-pointer, and Love adds the icing on the cake, 92-75, denying his opponent any hope of a comeback. Mills responds with a three-pointer, and Love hits the inside to make a free throw. Then comes the "Kobe moment." He makes 3 of 3 three-pointers, 105-80. With less than 5 minutes left in the game, Love makes a fast break dunk, 107-80. The U.S. team completely defeats its opponent. In the end, the U.S. team wins a 119-86 victory
